Class Exit

  • java.lang.Object
    • objects.Exit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Exit
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Exit object containing the directions and connected locations the user can go to
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Crabman
